channel.title: Help guys
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i920.photobucket.com/albums/ad42/titas_2010/help.png[/img]
my staff of light wears as a helmet how do i changed it so its a weapon i tried looking at item.java couldnt find it im using project insanity base?

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:12, topic:354518”][quote author=titas09 link=topic=451086.msg3306931#msg3306931 date=1281729597]
everything i add wears as a helm i can change the wearing of others at item.java but i cant change it so it wears as a weapon =[
[/quote]

Just Add it in your item.java, dont worry if its not already there.
Make sure you add it under your weapons integer.[/quote]

theres no weapon spot in item.java, weapon is default any code not in any of the slots in item.java automatically goes into weapon slot, or it should anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @titas09 titas09
item.description:
@titas09 wrote:

well there aint no weapon spot… maybe u can tell me were 2 change my item default?

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

titas09:

everything i add wears as a helm i can change the wearing of others at item.java but i cant change it so it wears as a weapon =[

Just Add it in your item.java, dont worry if its not already there.
Make sure you add it under your weapons integer.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @titas09 titas09

everything i add wears as a helm i can change the wearing of others at item.java but i cant change it so it wears as a weapon =[

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @titas09 titas09
item.description:
@titas09 wrote:

the item id isnt in there :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Item.java get your item id and remove it from the hat/helmet/full mask/full hwlmet section and delete it. Now when it’s deleted it should be a weapon. You don’t have to add the item to item.java if it’s a weapon.

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

jmood128:

You have to add the ID of your Staff of Light to the Item.java.

no he doesnt, there is no space for weapons in item.java, weapon is default slot to get it into weapon slot he has to delete it from the hat spot.

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You have to add the ID of your Staff of Light to the Item.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

[quote=“darkangel996, post:4, topic:354518”][quote author=Darkmagic42 link=topic=451086.msg3306594#msg3306594 date=1281710183]
if this is a 317 all u have to do is go into item.java and search for this code, public static int hats[] = {
once u search that should be bunch of item ids beside it, to make ur staff of light a weapon just search for the item id and delete it from that list. any id not in item.java default goes to weapon spot. Hope this helps:)
[/quote]

WTF! seriously?? 508?? dude look at the pic dude its cleary a 317 from lack of graphics.

honestly people these days.[/quote]

at least i tried to help him?o and look at that i even edited post to 317, dont flame shit if ur not even trying to help

Read full topic

item.title: Help guys
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

You should be able to find in one of the java files that you added the model to and it would have WearItemAs or something like that.
Change that to what ever you want it to be on!
